column1: purchase_greenland_desc;Greenland is geographically closer to Arcadia than to Mainland Scandinavia
column2: Surely it should belong to us for a good price?;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: conquer_lusitania_desc;In order to become the dominant power in the new world we must cut Gran Colombia down to size
column2: quite literally;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: gran_colombia_beacon_of_liberty_desc;We are now ready to throw our doors open to the souls trying to find a better life in the New World;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
integrate_aimara_nan_desc;Now we have secured the region
column2: we can now begin to integrate the Aimara people into our society;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
long supporters of our nations
column3: are now a part of our nation. We must ensure their rights are guaranteed for the foreseeable future;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: integrate_amazonie_nan_desc;The people of Amazonie have been eager to embrace the ideas of Panamerigaism but struggled to accept it being under Beornia. However
column2: they finally appear ready to embrace our Beornian ideals;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: inc_save_patagonia_desc;Beornia has decided to claim the Patagonians lands for their own. We should save the natives and claim the lands for our own!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
empire_inca_3_desc;After securing Ameriga from Gran Colombia
column2: our leader has decided we should liberate all former slaves from their oppressors!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: trinidad_purchase_desc;The Isle of Trinidad lies just a short distance away from Tobago
column2: maybe we can convince Gran Colombia to sell it to us for a small price?;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: curaco_purchase_title;Purchase of Curacao and St. Jean;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
curaco_purchase_desc;The Isles of Curacao and St. Jean are of no real significance to Burgundy
column2: maybe they will part ways with them for a price?;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
the Isle of Bermuda has caused the previous owner problems due to the superstitions surrounding the so-called Bermuda Triangle
column3: maybe we can rid them of their problems for a small fee?;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: we have united the Caribbean under New Courland! Whilst an impressive achievement
column3: we could still do more though...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: greater_austral_destiny_desc;We now occupy all our nearby islands
column2: it's now time to proclaim our greatest ambitions!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: treaty_of_waitangi_gan_desc;Our Diplomats have managed to convince the Maori tribes to sign an unequal treaty. Let's act before they figure out how unequal it was!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
unite_the_chinese_diasporas_desc;The former Chinese colonies have a lot in common
column2: maybe we should strive to unite these states under one banner?;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: chinese_diasporas_united_desc;We have united the former colonies under one banner! May the future for all of us be prosperous;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
dng_pacific_destiny_desc;We should seek to claim and integrate the isles of the pacific into our country for it is our mare nostrum!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
timor_purchase_desc;The isles that compose the colony of Timor are likely of little strategic importance to the Europeans
column2: maybe we could buy them in order to extend our reach into the Moluccas;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: cooperation_with_qingqiu_desc;Whilst some of our hawkish advisors are advocating for Qingqiu's non-existence
column2: some are suggesting we co-operate instead in order to gain a valuable ally in Arcadia instead. Let's trust the latter which will likely ease tensions between us and the rest of the world;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: forward_the_aragonese_claims_desc;Now that we have united the heartlands of Aragon under our control
column2: we can now claim their possessions in Italy for ourselves!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: integrating_napoli_desc;We finally now have control over the Aragonese holdings in Italy! Let us now adopt their administration so we can integrate the locals into our Iberian Dream!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
his_move_capital_desc;With the wars with Gran Colombia now a distant memory
column2: let us move our capital to better represent our nation. Question is where?;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
we should now look to regaining our control over the Mediterranean;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: become_arpitania_desc;We have managed to secure the historic heartlands of the kingdom of Arles
column2: let us now reclaim that legacy!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: arp_conquered_switzerland_desc;We have successfully subjugated Switzerland and now all we have left to do is integrate them into our society;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
arles_kingdom_unified_desc;All of the historic Arles land now lies under our direct authority
column2: let us proclaim an empire and enter a new golden age!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: arles_burgundy_integrate_savoy_desc;We have now consolidated our hold on Savoy for long enough that the people here are slowly accepting our rule! With a few enshrined rights for them in a constitutional amendment we can maybe bring them fully under the fold;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
sar_annex_geneva_desc;We have conquered Geneva and it shall now form a core part of our territory!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
sar_annex_genoa_desc;We have conquered Genoa and it shall now form a core part of our territory!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
form_lombardy_venetia_lom_desc;We now own both Milan and Venice
column2: the two largest cities in northern Italy. With this we can proclaim the state of Lombardy-Venetia!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: secure_emilia_lom_desc;We have successfully taken control of the Italian city states of Modena and Parma
column2: with this we can now project our power down the Po!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: form_lombardy_venetia_ven_desc;We now own both Venice and Milan
column2: the two largest cities in northern Italy. With this we can proclaim the state of Venetia-Lombardy!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
we should now start thinking about forming a nation that caters for every Italian and unify our people under one flag;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: central_italian_union_desc;With central Italy now under our rule
column2: we should now think about bringing the rest of Italy under our heel;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: ita_latin_empire_desc;We did what aragon could not and can now proclaim a Latin empire! Let us now make sure that all those lands are fully under our control;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
ita_adriatic_empire_desc;We have followed in Venice's footsteps and now control the Adriatic. We should continue to expand and control the Balkans and the Aegean sea as well!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
dual_monarchy_direction_desc;For years the English and French have been at odds with one another
column2: we must now make a choice whether to side with one of them or embrace a new movement who are identifying themselves as Anglois;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: dm_integrate_breton_desc;The Bretons are a melting pot of French and Celtic and are a good first step in trying to embrace the wider Dual Monarch population;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
dm_integrate_welsh_desc;The Welsh are a melting pot of English and Celtic and are a good first step in trying to embrace the wider Dual Monarch population;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
dm_anglois_success_desc;The Anglois dream of uniting French and English has come to fruition
column2: now both groups consider themselves a part of the Dual Monarchy;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: dm_integrate_burgundy_desc;The Burgundian lands have long been claimed by the French crown
column2: now with the defeat of burgundy we can make these claims a reality;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
for a long time
column3: claimed the English throne and have been an annoyance. However we can now reconcile with these misguided pretenders and forge a new friendship!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: dm_control_over_savoie_desc;Savoie is at the crossroads of Italian
column2: French and Burgundian ambitions and as such all claim this strategic region part of their own country. We must make sure the region belongs to us at all costs!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: dm_claim_atlantic_isles_title;Securing the isles of the Atlantic;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
dm_claim_atlantic_isles_desc;Now we are in a dominant position over the British isles
column2: it's time to make sure our navy has the ability to project power across the entire World and for that we will need ports in the Atlantic to refuel;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: dm_claim_beornia_desc;The claim of Beornia to the English throne is outlandish and misguided. We must show them that only one nation can claim it and that shall be us!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

english_language_schooling_desc;We have reached a point where influential figures in government now advocate for the English language to be the only official language in our nation. Let's embrace them and become a monocultural nation!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

french_language_schooling_desc;We have reached a point where influential figures in government now advocate for the French language to be the only official language in our nation. Let's embrace them and become a monocultural nation!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
form_france_brg_desc;We have finally answered our ancestor's claim to the French throne! Beware though our subjects in the north might not approve of our shift in direction...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
fra_integrate_anglois_desc;The Anglois are devoted to the Dual Monarchy. However their French routes are deep also
column2: if we can tap into that then we might be able to convince them of joining us. Viva la France!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: become_arpitania_brg_desc;We have managed to secure the historic heartlands of the kingdom of Arles
column2: let us now reclaim that legacy!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: form_confederation_of_rhine_brg_desc;We have gained enough influence over the southern and western German states to proclaim a united Confederation. This will require a change in court however as many people are not happy with this sudden change of direction
column2: both inside and outside our country...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: crh_integrate_danube_desc;We can now look to integrate more Germans into our empire as we are now an established nation;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
integrate_irish_sca_desc;Now that we control all of Ireland
column2: we should begin to focus on integrating the Irish into out nation;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: integrate_welsh_sca_desc;Now that we control all of Wales
column2: we should begin to focus on integrating the Welsh into out nation;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: integrate_anglois_sca_desc;Now that our hold on the british isles has consolidated
column2: we can focus on bringing the former rulers into the Scandinavian fold;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: white_sea_dominace_sca_desc;We have confirmed our naval dominance in the White Sea and can now look into expanding further into Russia and Siberia;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
sca_claim_vinland_desc;We shall try to return to our colonies in Arcadia and seek to control the elusive North-West Passage for our ships!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
sca_claim_siberia_desc;We shall try to settle Siberia as we explore the potential of the North-East shipping route;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: the Holy Roman Empire had a iron grasp on Italy. Now
column3: we have recovered the lands beyond the Alps and with railroads can now secure the region once more!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: once a part of the Empire long ago and the gate between the Rhine and the sea
column3: is now once again under control of the emperor. Let us secure the region so well known for it's sailors to create our own navy!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: follow_rhine_north_desc;We are now in a position to contest Burgundy for the control of the lower Rhine! Taking this will provide our nation with some of the finest ports in the World!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
sgf_integrate_slovenia_desc;Slovenia is a melting pot of Germanic
column2: Italian and Balkan ideas and cultures. If we emphasise their Germanic connections then they might just accept our legitimate rule;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: alpine_kingdom_desc;We have managed to secure the mountains of the Alps
column2: a major strategic success due to their ease to defend and abundance of raw materials;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: duchy_of_swabia_desc;We've united Baden and Wurttemberg under one flag! We should now focus on restoring the long lost idea of a united Swabia although it will be tricky;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
form_zapaoslavia_desc;We have united the West Slavic lands under one banner!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
zap_integrate_baltics_desc;The Baltic states have some cultural influences from Prussian and polish settlers and have lacked independent rule for a while
column2: let's safeguard their heritage and provide them with an autonomy they haven't experienced since the Baltic crusades!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: zap_ruthenian_commonwealth_desc;The Ruthenians have struggled to find a country they can call home and are threatened by a resurgent Russia in the East. Let us protect the Ruthenians and stand with them against the Russian Bear!

zap_elbian_commonwealth_desc;The Elbians have long influenced the West Slavic states which can be seen in the numerous settlements dotted across Poland and Bohemia. We can now fully bring the population on board and create a commonwealth that will protect them from any Scandinavian or Burgundian intervention in Germany;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
integrate_estonia_plc_desc;The Estonians are unique in the fact their language and culture has more similarities to Uralic
column2: Finnish or even Hungarian than to Lithuanian. However
column3: the geography of the Baltics means that some customs are shared and it will be these that we use to show the population that Estonians and Lithuanians are not that different after all;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: tame_crimea_plc_desc;The Crimeans have long mingled with polish Cossacks and hussars and Crimean horse breeds is still considered far superior to most other European breeds. Let us embrace their traditions and reconcile the Cossacks and the Crimeans!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: a predominantly Christian ethnic group
column3: have long wanted a Christian government to answer to. We are now in the position to answer that very call;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: integrate_kazakh_culture_desc;The great Stepps of Central Asia are home to the Kazakh peoples
column2: a nomadic group who have never really know what a stable government is. Through our Cossacks though we might be able to communicate with them and slowly integrate them into our society;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

Ruthenian and Russian Settlers have been making the Pontic steppe their home. With this time they have managed to integrate their way of life with the Crimean way of life. Perhaps we can use this to assimilate the Crimeans into  our government?;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: integrate_lithuanian_culture_desc;The Lithuanians share many customs and ideals as the Latvians so it should be easy convincing the Lithuanians to join us once the Latvians have done so;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: Germans from the Hanseatic League set up trading posts across the Baltic and even at Neva
column3: many of whom later settled and now refer to themselves as Prussians. Many of these German minorities have lived in peace with our settlers so getting them to accept our rule with some autonomy should be easy!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: hun_balkan_focus_desc;The Balkan Peninsular is of strategic importance for us to hold and is contested by the Ottomans and the Venetians. We must make moves before they do!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: we can now push towards the black sea as obtaining a port here will allow us to secure a safe harbour for a new navy;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: hun_push_to_the_aegean_desc;Now that we have secured Serbia
column2: we should now consider trying to remove the Venetian and Ottoman presence from the Balkans for good! Greece is a lynchpin in both of their ambitions so taking it will ruin any future expansion for them and provide us with the idyllic ports of the Aegean Sea!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: propose_a_danubian_federation_desc;Against all odds we have secured a strong position in southern Germany! We should seek to create a union of all the peoples of the Danube in order to project our power even further!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
dnb_following_the_rivers_desc;We have reached a point where we can now decide on a new focus for our country
column2: whether it be consolidation or expanding past the Danube.;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: hun_integrate_slovenia_desc;The Slovenes are similar in language and culture to the Croats but have also adopted certain things from Italian and German Influences. With Croats already a integral part of our realm
column2: lets add Hungarian to the Slovene melting pot shall we?;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: hun_integrate_serbia_desc;The differences between the Serbs and the Hungarians are very noticeable but what is also clear is the relief of not being under Ottoman rule anymore. Maybe with a little autonomy we can set aside our differences and start a new chapter?;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

hun_integrate_albania_desc;The Albanians were not so long ago in a full-blown civil war against the Turks. Our liberation of them has obviously been greeted with great celebration on both sides and it seems likely that the Albanians will find great things to come as our new citizens!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

hun_integrate_bulgaria_desc;The Bulgarians have long been forced to live in poor conditions under Ottoman rule but now with us guiding them things have improved... Well that's what we are telling them anyway! We have now reached a point though where many Bulgarians are now happy to call our country home;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: the descendants of the late Byzantine Empire
column3: are once again experiencing somewhat independent rule
column4: free from Venetian or Ottoman interference. We can now celebrate their liberation with a ceremony in Constantinople
column5: the Hagia Sophia once again returning to it's role as a christian church and centrepiece for these celebrations;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: integrate_mon_ser_desc;We now control Montenegro whose people are 100% Serbs through and through
column2: it will be hard denying that Montenegro should be a core part of Serbia;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: accept_serb_alb_desc;For a long time now Albanians and Serbs have lived in harmony
column2: we should continue this relationship in government;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: accept_greek_alb_desc;For a long time now Albanians have lived as a minority in Greece in relative peace
column2: we should continue this relationship now as a majority;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: accept_bulgarian_alb_desc;The balkan cultures should stick together
column2: the outside threats are too severe!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: integrate_greeks_bul_desc;The Greeks and Bulgarians have lived in relative peace with each other in Macedonia for a long time
column2: we should continue this in government although it will upset the Turks in our country...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: integrate_turks_bul_desc;The Bulgarians remained loyal to the old Turkish regime until it was no longer viable
column2: this loyalty will surely shine through in government although aligning with the Turks will upset the Greeks...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: integrate_albanians_bul_desc;The balkan cultures should stick together
column2: the outside threats are too severe!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: integrate_serbs_bul_desc;The Serbians and Bulgarians have crossed paths many times in Macedonia. We should be able to convince them to join our nation as long as we keep the Turks out of Europe! §RNOTE: This is mutually exclusive with the accepting Turkish decision§!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
romanian_bulgarian_union_desc;Romanians and Bulgarians have many differences despite the lack of a geographic barrier. A union will require a lot of convincing of both peoples...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
integrate_the_minorities_rom_desc;Romania has many minorities living here with Ruthenians
column2: Germans
column3: and Hungarians just to name a few. We should start reforming our country in order to better represent them;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: balkan_dominance_rom_desc;The balkans are fractured and vulnerable to outside threats. We should Consolidate the region in order to safeguard the people there;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
integrate_greeks_rom_desc;The greeks are perhaps the closest culturally to us Romanians
column2: they should be a good start in order to integrate the rest of the Balkans;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: integrate_serbs_rom_desc;The balkan cultures should stick together
column2: the outside threats are too severe!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: integrate_alb_rom_desc;The balkan cultures should stick together
column2: the outside threats are too severe!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: unite_carpathia_desc;The Carpathian Region is now fully under our control
column2: we should now proclaim a new government in order to address the regions many linguistic differences;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
for a long time
column3: been under the polish influence. We should look to integrate them in order to secure a black sea port and protect our borders with Hungary more;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: reform_jagiellonian_union_desc;The Jagiellonian Union was a union that composed of
column2: at different time periods
column3: the nations of Hungary
column6: Bohemia and Lithuania under one dynasty. Whilst the Polish-Lithuanian Union continues it's legacy
column7: a greater union is a distant memory. But now we can revive this memory into a modern union!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: reform_lesser_jagiellonian_union_desc;The Jagiellonian Union was a union that composed of
column2: at different time periods
column3: the nations of Hungary
column6: Bohemia and Lithuania under one dynasty. Whilst the Polish-Lithuanian Union continues it's legacy
column7: a greater union is a distant memory. But for now we can revive this memory into a modern union between the polish

column1: jagiellonian_integrate_romania_desc;The Romanian population have been ruled over directly and indirectly over the past centuries by both Hungarian and Polish Kings. By fabricating history texts that declare this to be a golden age of Romanian arts
column2: literature and prosperity we can once again bring the people on board!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: byz_eastern_focus_desc;Now that we have reformed Byzantium
column2: we should focus on restoring it's eastern borders in order to bring civilization to the people of the near east;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: byz_egypt_push_desc;By using the plight of the Coptic Christians and it's strategic position
column2: we can justify a war to reclaim Egypt back for the basileus!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: byz_western_focus_desc;Now that we have reformed Byzantium
column2: we should focus on restoring it's western borders in order to protect the people of the Balkans from outside intervention;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: byz_italian_push_desc;Now that we have secured the Balkans
column2: we can now focus on getting a foothold in Italy and return Byzantine rule to Naples!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: macedonian_ambition_desc;Alexander the great invaded Persia and created an empire spanning from Greece to the edges of India. We shall now set out to do the same!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
mac_to_india_desc;Alexander's conquests stopped at the Indus River
column2: ours don't have to though and our technology is vastly superior. India won't be the end of the empire
column3: it will be the start of ours!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: macedon_egypt_invasion_desc;Egypt is an important location both in ancient and modern times. We should secure the region in order to secure our empire!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

mac_accept_christian_caucassians_desc;The Christian population east of Constantinople has been under constant pressure to accept and convert to their overlord's beliefs. We can now offer them respite from this and a nation that they can safely call home!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
mac_accept_turks_kurds_desc;The Kurdish population are in an unusual position
column2: being majority Islamic but still prosecuted by Iraqis
column3: Turks and Persians for ages. Maybe we can offer them a brighter future?;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: become_greece_mac_desc;Whilst remaining Macedonia in order to fulfil Alexander's legacy is good
column2: declaring us the next Greek state will grant us more legitimacy and still lets us do Alexander's legacy justice;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: claim_venice_yugo_desc;Venice is a natural expansion route for Yugoslavia and the people here have long settled in the Balkans for the purpose of trade so integrating their customs into our society shall be easy;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
aftermath_tur_civil_war_title;The Aftermath of the Ottoman Civil War;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
aftermath_tur_civil_war_desc;The sultanate survives and the Kurds are crushed but the Balkans and Egypt are lost. With the anger still evident through society
column2: we must decide on what course to take in order to rebuild and restore our nation to it's former glory if at all possible!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: reclaim_bulgaria_tur_desc;The Bulgarians are an obvious first step in re-securing our position in the Balkans. We should start making plans in order to invade them;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
reclaim_greece_tur_desc;Greece is a key part in what made the Ottomans such a strong power in Europe for centuries
column2: we need to restore our rule over the region in order to once again be taken seriously by other European powers;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: reclaim_wallachia_tur_desc;Wallachia has always been an issue
column2: it's people disloyal and it's position south of the Danube making it hard to secure. However
column3: this time we will secure it once and for all!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: reclaim_albania_tur_desc;The Albanians are an odd case
column2: fighting for independence but also adopting our customs more readily compared to other Balkan cultures. Nevertheless we must re-secure the region in order to gain ports in the Adriatic sea to challenge Venice;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: reclaim_serbia_tur_desc;The Serbians have always been rebellious towards anyone who wanted to occupy them. This time however we will secure the region and ensure loyalty to the Sultan is maintained at all cost...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
reclaim_croatia_tur_desc;Croatia was the boundary for the Ottoman empire in it's heyday
column2: returning to this territory will definitely put us back on the map!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: reclaim_hungary_tur_desc;Hungary was the boundary for the Ottoman empire in it's heyday with it's position bordering the now defunct Holy Roman Empire a statement of defiance against Christian powers
column2: returning to this territory will definitely put us back on the map!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: reclaim_egypt_tur_desc;Egypt was the Ottoman Breadbasket and it shall be once again! It's position at a narrow stretch of land between the Red and Mediterranean seas also could provide some use later on...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

reclaim_arabia_tur_desc;Arabia and the holy cities of Medina and Mecca have been a source of legitimacy for the Ottoman Empire for ages. Restoring our rule over these lands will once again give us the prestige in the eyes of the Muslim world!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
reclaim_mesopotamia_tur_desc;Iraq broke free from Ottoman rule and is now seeking to carve out it's own path in Persia or the Levant. We must end these ambitions prematurely...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: despite what outsiders may first think
column3: has many differences compared to the cultures of the Arabian Peninsular. Closing the gaps between them will take time...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: tur_arabian_integration_2_desc;The first series of reforms have been successful in integrating the Turkish culture with the cultures of the Arabic World
column2: let us continue then and embrace the peoples of Egypt and North Africa as well!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: tur_caucasia_focus_desc;Our Adisors have a mad ambition to create a pan-Turkic state. Their first plan is to invade the Safavids in order to reconnect with our people in Azerbaijan and get access to the steppes of Tatarstan;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
tur_tatarstan_focus_desc;Now that we have secured the Caucasian mountains
column2: we can push into the European steppes and liberate the Turkic people there!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: tur_into_turania_title;Declration of the State of Turania;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

tur_into_turania_desc;Somehow the mad dream of uniting the Turkic people of the world is coming true! We have decided to declare the nation of Turania now in order to build support in the Turkic regions ready for our liberation to reach them!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

egypt_arabia_desc;The collapse of the Ottoman power over the Arabian Peninsular has left a power vacuum which we can now fill! We also have the benefit of being more relatable to the Arabs than the foreign Turks ever were!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
egypt_maghreb_desc;The Maghreb Region has been held under Iberian rule for a long time but now maybe we can reverse their fortunes and restore local rule over these areas?;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
tar_reclaim_the_steppes_desc;We should seek to unite with our kin in the steppes to our East!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
tks_reclaim_tatarstan_desc;We must follow our ancient ancestors west to liberate the Tatars from European imperialism!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
tks_restore_timurids_desc;Timur and his descendants once ruled over Persia for a long and prosperous period and before them were the Ilkhanate. Let us restore their legacies once more;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
claim_greater_burma_desc;Now we have restored our core territory
column2: it's time to expand further into the decaying Khmer Empire and Bengali Sultanate;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: second_taungoo_empire_desc;We have now proven to be the dominant power in the region and have restored the glory of the Taungoo dynasty!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
supremacy_over_khmer_desc;We have restored Thai rule over the majority of the Thai pops in the decaying Khmer Empire
column2: we must now lay to rest the relic of an empire;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: dominate_indochina_sia_desc;We are now in a unopposed position to cement our rule over the rest of the Indochinese Peninsular!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: thanks to it's geographical position
column3: Malacca has harboured many Chinese and Malay traders who have called the Peninsular their home. We should establish more freedoms for these people as their trade and cooperation is profitable for both them and the state;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: old_empire_restored_cam_title;The Second Golden age of Khmer!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
old_empire_restored_cam_desc;We have restored our rule not just across our former lands but also across the entirety of Indochina! This is truly a second golden age!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

cham_migration_desc;Our peoples have managed to survive against all odds against numerous states and empires. The struggle isn't over yet though and if we can ride out the storm once more then maybe we can forge a new empire in the region?;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
dominate_indochina_chp_desc;We are now in a unopposed position to cement our rule over the rest of the Indochinese Peninsular!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: we can now look to extend our rule across the rest of the archipelago and forge a new maritime empire!

column1: conquer_champa_dai_desc;Champa is the weakest state in the Indochinese region and is the first strike for Khmer in their effort to restore their rule over the region. We will need to 'protect' them!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
dominate_indochina_dai_desc;We are now in a unopposed position to cement our rule over the rest of the Indochinese Peninsular!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
dai_defy_the_dragon_desc;China is embroiled in civil unrest and war
column2: we shall use this to our advantage and open up the backdoor into China!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
somehow
column3: united China under one rule again but this time from Hanoi. Let us restore the Dragon throne and become the leaders of a new

column1: greater_tibet_desc;Now we have unified the Tibetan People we can look to our neighbours in order to truly secure our borders;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
invade_manchuria_kor_desc;Now the dust has settled with our war with Japan
column2: we should seek to expand our borders North to the Amur;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: claim_ainu_kor_desc;The Ainu lands in Siberia are rich in resources
column2: we should take this from under Japan's nose;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: break_the_japanese_island_chain_desc;Our Naval Capacity is being contained and restricted by Japan's control of islands around us
column2: we must break this if we want to be relevant on the global stage;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: form_china_qing_desc;We have finally finished the Civil war and united China once again!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
form_china_taiping_desc;We have finally finished the Civil war and united China once again!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
form_china_korea_desc;We have destroyed the renegade states of China and the dragon throne is empty. Maybe it's time for a new Korean Chinese dynasty?;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
restore_yuan_china_desc;We should claim our predecessor's former lands to truly claim their legitimacy!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
restore_qing_china_desc;Now the dust has settled and the civil war now behind us
column2: we should reclaim our former borders and return to our golden age!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: establish_taiping_china_desc;Now the dust has settled and the civil war now behind us
column2: we should set our stance and claims in the region and assert our Hegemony over Asia;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: draw_the_nine_dash_line_desc;It is clear that modern world powers need a strong navy. Therefore we must assert our authority over the entirety of the South China Sea;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: we should assert ourselves over our former renegade colonies;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: establish_trung_quoc_desc;With Vietnamese control over China now solidified
column2: we should set our stance and claims in the region and assert our Hegemony over Asia;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: the_roof_of_the_world_title;The Dragon Sat atop of the Roof;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
the_roof_of_the_world_desc;With Tibetan control over China now solidified
column2: we should set our stance and claims in the region and assert our Hegemony over Asia;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: seize_bengal_china_desc;The Bengal Region of India is important due to it's fertile grounds
column2: large population and confluence of 3 major rivers. We must secure to secure the Tibetan Plateau;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: establish_jung_gug_desc;With Korean control over China now solidified
column2: we should set our stance and claims in the region and assert our Hegemony over Asia;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
Japan has plagued Korea and China with invasions and piracy. This will now all come to an end now...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: japanese_imperialism_manchuria_desc;Manchuria is of strategic importance for any future mainland incursion. The army is in full support of a full-on Invasion which should be swift thanks to China's disarray...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
japan_invade_china_proper_desc;We are at the gates of Beijing
column2: controlling the city and surrounding area would be a huge prestige bonus and provide a new palace for the emperor although it could be viewed negatively by the European Powers...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: japan_conquer_china_desc;Our commanders have drawn up plans to proceed with a full-scale Invasion and Annexation of China. This would be a huge achievement for the Japanese Empire but could risk international relations...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

japan_asian_superpower_desc;We are now considered in the eyes of the world as the world's greatest power. With that we could approach our Chinese subjects to show how well off they are being in the Japanese empire;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

japan_conquer_taiwan_desc;Taiwan is isolated from china by sea and it's owner is weakened by the ongoing conflicts in mainland china. We should seize the opportunity and integrate it into our empire!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

japanese_imperialism_christinia_desc;The Islands that lie south of Taiwan are rich in resources and should be an easy way to show off our modernised navy and finally prove that we can stand toe-to-toe with the European powers!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
japanese_co_prosperity_sphere_desc;Now with Christinia now under Japanese administration
column2: we should continue south and strike the remaining European colonisers in the Indonesian Islands and liberate the natives of the area!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: japan_invade_austral_desc;The Chinese renegade state of Zhouauo should be considered a part of our greater East Asian sphere. We must make sure this is the case though all means necessary.;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
unite_malay_peninsular_desc;We have united our local region and our leaders now seek to expand our influence across more of the Indonesian archipelago;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
unite_sumatra_desc;We have united our island and now our leaders seek to expand our influence across more of the Indonesian archipelago;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
unite_borneo_desc;We have united our island and our leaders now seek to expand our influence across more of the Indonesian archipelago;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
unite_java_desc;We have united our island and our leaders now seek to expand our influence across more of the Indonesian archipelago;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
unite_moluccas_desc;We have united our islands and our leaders now seek to expand our influence across more of the Indonesian archipelago;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
unite_philippines_desc;We have united the Philippines under our rule and now our leaders look to expand our influence across more of the Indonesian archipelago;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
form_nusantara_special_desc;We have united enough islands to claim the legacy of the old empires that once ruled over these islands centuries ago!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

taming_the_western_steppes_desc;We are descendants of the Kubai Khan himself and to do his legacy justice we must unify the steppes to our west and once again become the scourge of Europe;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
fra_integrate_dutch_desc;The dutch populace was alienated when we declared the kingdom of France
column2: however time has passed now and they are willing to be reintegrated into our country;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: assimilate_incas_desc;The nation of the Incas is destroyed
column2: lost to time and the people lack leadership. This is a good time to assimilate the Incan subjects into our own realm;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: reclaim_greater_mali_fja_desc;We have managed to recover much of the historic lands of the Malian Empire
column2: we should proclaim ourselves to be it's successor!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: reclaim_greater_mali_mossi_desc;We have managed to recover much of the historic lands of the Malian Empire
column2: we should proclaim ourselves to be it's successor!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: restore_rule_over_coast_ash_desc;The Europeans drove us from the coast in order to setup the infamous triangle trade
column2: we should seek their return to us as compensation;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: conquer_dahomey_ash_desc;We have subjugated our neighbour and can now claim this land to be rightfully ours!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
integrate_niger_delta_desc;We have consolidated control over the Niger Delta
column2: an area rich in resources. We need to act fast though before word of this land reaches elsewhere!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: control_the_coast_oyo_desc;We have conquered our neighbours and secured the coastline which will provide us with plenty of resources!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
conquer_kanem_bornu_sok_desc;Kanem Bornu has existed as a state for millennium but now it's time to incorporate them into our new empire!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
unite_sudan_desc;We have now united the Kingdoms of Darfur and Funj into one country and can now look towards securing the rest of the upper Nile!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
advance_into_egypt_sudan_desc;We should now seek to claim the south of egypt in order to secure the Nile and the food it provides;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
invade_eritrea_sudan_desc;In order to secure a coastline with more viable ports
column2: we have invaded Eritrea and should now seek to crush the remains of Abyssinia in order to secure our rule in the region;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: unite_horn_of_africa_desc;The Horn of Africa is of vital importance to shipping
column2: especially due to rumours of a new canal being considered to connect the Red Sea and the Mediterranean. We should secure it if we want to have influence over shipping;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: conquer_nubia_eth_desc;The Nubians have been oppressed by the sudanese and it is up to us to liberate them!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
liberate_the_coptics_eth_desc;The Coptics have been suppressed in Egypt for too long
column2: we must liberate them!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: claim_upper_nile_desc;The peoples of the upper Nile are largely pastoral and unorganised but share some common cultural beliefs with us
column2: we should use this as our claim to the region!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: secure_the_coast_kon_desc;We have secured the coast which will allow us to do business with Europeans on more balanced terms;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
secure_the_hinterlands_kon_desc;The Rainforests of the Kongo must be tamed in order to establish ourselves as a regional power;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
establish_greater_kongo_desc;With Europeans scrambling to get colonies
column2: we must claim beyond our core lands in order to secure the survival of our peoples;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: conquer_mongo_aza_desc;Mongo is the gateway into the Kongolese basin and as such we must establish rule over them to secure our country's interest;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
reach_rift_valley_aza_desc;The Rift Valley is full of valuable resources thanks to it's geology. We must secure this in order to bankroll our economy;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
establish_greater_azande_desc;With Europeans scrambling to get colonies
column2: we must claim beyond our core lands in order to secure the survival of our peoples;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: control_lake_ukerewe_desc;Lake Ukerewe is the lifeblood of people and as such we must make sure that we are the ones who control it;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

secure_northern_border_rwa_desc;Our eastern flank has many people who would like to take control of the rich resources that our kingdom is home to. We should secure this to halt their ambitions and liberate our peoples from them;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
dominate_west_africa_rwa_desc;With Europeans scrambling to get colonies
column2: we must claim beyond our core lands in order to secure the survival of our peoples;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: unite_southern_bantu_tribes_desc;The Tribes of the area are finally united under one ruler
column2: let this be a first step towards a new empire!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: conquer_kongo_bantu_desc;We should invade the Kongo in order to remove our northern threats;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
conquer_shona_bantu_desc;The Shona should be subjugated in order to secure our southern border against the advancing Boer settlers;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
conquer_kazembe_sho_desc;We have to conquest our Northern neighbours in order to secure more land and resources for our fight against the Boers!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
sieze_mozambique_sho_desc;Through shrewd negotiation or maybe guerrilla warfare
column2: we have obtained the Mozambique for our nation!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: unite_the_nguni_tribes_desc;We have united the local tribes into one nation which we can use to hold against the Boers;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
integrate_the_sothos_desc;These tribes to our north are share many things with our culture and traditions and are also struggling against the Boers
column2: let us unite against our common enemy!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: integrate_the_basstards_unciv_desc;Now we have adopted western reforms and tactics
column2: the Baastards are more willing to work with our government!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: integrate_the_crimeans_rom_desc;With Greater Romania Established and our core minorities integrated
column2: we now should start to integrate the newest minorities into our country as well;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
meaning reorganization of the Ottoman Empire
column3: was a period of reformation that was characterized by various attempts to modernize the Ottoman Empire
column4: to secure its territorial integrity against nationalist movements and aggressive powers. The reforms encouraged Ottomanism among the diverse ethnic groups of the Empire
column5: attempting to stem the tide of nationalist movements within the Ottoman Empire. The reforms attempted to integrate non-Muslims and non-Turks more thoroughly into Ottoman society by enhancing their civil liberties and granting them equality throughout the Empire.;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: return_to_scandi_desc;It is time for us return to our roots in Scandinavia after the government there has been proven unable to provide for the people there;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
reform_netherlands_belgium_title;§O Returning to the Old Belgium§!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
reform_netherlands_belgium_desc;The Flemish has been second class citizens to the Burgundians for too long
column2: we shall now establish a Republic in the lowlands compromising of the people who live in the lowlands.;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: form_triple_monarchy_title;§p Formation of the Triple Monarchy§!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: we have always held a claim to the dual throne
column3: however with our foothold established in Europe we can now claim legitimately that we are the true heirs to a new
column4: triple crown although what's left of the previous administration may now seek claims on our throne in Arcadia;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: annex_vinland_arc_desc;We should embrace the original Arcadian vision and seek to integrate the Vinlanders into our nation;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
annex_qingqiu_arc_desc;In order to be a true global power we should integrate the nation of Qingqiu in order to project power across two Oceans;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
annex_plantagenia_arc_desc;We should embrace the original Arcadian vision and seek to integrate the Plantagenians into our nation;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

annex_mexico_arc_desc;Gran Colombia has been a thorn in our side trying to prevent the unification of Arcadia in some format. However we have now united and we should march south to end the Gran Colombian menace for once and for all!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
restore_order_to_boers_title;§ORestore Control over the Boer Colonies§!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

restore_order_to_boers_desc;The Boer states are breakaway colonies that believe the state was ignoring their needs and was neglecting the Dutch and Flemish people. This is fake news and we should mount an expedition to regain control of our former colonies in South Africa;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
dutch_boer_septiman_union_title;Union of the Dutch and the Flemish peoples;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
dutch_boer_septiman_union_desc;We should seek to create a state that encompasses the entire peoples of the Dutch and Flemish who live in Europe
column2: Arcadia and South Africa;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: establish_greater_aragon_desc;We need to liberate the minority Catalonians in Spain in order to establish a larger buffer zone;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

dm_becoming_france_desc;We can no longer hold the British isles or have any prospect of reclaiming them. It has been proposed that we should abandon our claims to the english lands and instead focus on restoring a French Kingdom;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

dm_becoming_gb_desc;We can no longer hold the French lands or have any prospect of reclaiming them. It has been proposed that we should abandon our claims to the French lands and instead focus on restoring a British Kingdom;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: but the former slaves continue to be excluded from society. We would have everything to gain by making them full citizens
column3: ensuring their prosperity and our national cohesion.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: form_north_sea_empire_vin_desc;The North Sea Empire was a personal union between Scandinavia and England in the 11th century. A lot of time has passed now but we are now going to proclaim this empire once more!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
sca_baltic_empire_desc;An Empire stretching across the entire Baltic sea has been envisioned by some with the sea being linked through the Vikings
column2: the Hansa and the Teutons but now it's all unified under us! §R(NOTE: If we ever lose Scotland after taking this decision
column3: we will lose cores and accepted on it!)§!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: nov_conquer_finland_desc;Finland is a large territory which
column2: under Scandinavia
column3: allowed them to constrict trade between us and the rest of the world through the Gulf of Finland and the White Sea. Securing Finland now allows us to control our trade more;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: nov_conquer_livonia_desc;Livonia has two strategic purposes. One is the control of the Gulf of Finland for our trade and two is for the old Hanseatic city of Riga which controls the mouth of the Daugava River. By securing this we can make sure our trade continues to flow into the Baltic unimpeeded;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
nov_baltic_empire_desc;An Empire stretching across the entire Baltic sea has been envisioned by some with the sea being linked through the Vikings
column2: the Hansa and the Teutons but now it's all unified under us!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: third_rome_ambition_desc;The Byzantines were the last remnants of the Roman Empire until their conquest by the Ottomans. We shall now claim to be their successors and use it to claim protection of the Christians in Anatolia. We shall also claim Constantinople for our own and restore it to glory!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: the remains of the Burgundian crown have started to treat the Dutch people with suspicion that they might try to rebel and have cracked down harshly. Let us embrace them into our new republic!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: integrate_bohemians_desc;The Bohemian People are closely related to the german people thanks to Bohemia's ties to the Holy Roman Empire. Perhaps we can reintegrate these people into a Greater Germany!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
integrate_swamp_germans_desc;The Dutch People have felt a bit outcast by the dominance of the Burgundians. With their linguistic ties to Germanic
column2: maybe we can merge them into a greater Germany?;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: clm_secure_messippi_desc;The Messippi is the lifeline of the great plains to our north. Controlling this will give us a strategic and economical dominance over that region;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
clm_dominate_arcadia_desc;With our nation now stretching from Saint Eleanor to Porto Novo
column2: we can proclaim ourselves the hegemon of Arcadia;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: clm_conquer_qingqiu_desc;With the main cities under our control
column2: we can proclaim our dominance over Qingqiu and set about establishing a permanent regime;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
a now former Japanese colony
column3: has many resources which we can use to our advantage. We shall set about establishing firm control over the region to make the most of these resources;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: clm_secure_guiana_desc;Guiana is a vulnerable italian colony situated between us and Amazonie. We should quickly seize it to secure our position against the Amazonians;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
clm_secure_the_amazon_desc;The Amazon is vastly unexplored and has many resources. We should secure the entrance to the rainforest in order to have a future monopoly over it;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
clm_dominate_ameriga_desc;With the Fall of Port Liberte and Port Sucre
column2: we now span across the entire longitude of the continent at it's widest point. We have therefore established complete dominance over the continent;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: clm_conquer_incas_desc;The Incas have finally fallen. With this the main threat to Gran Colombia in Ameriga is now extinct and we can now look towards re-educating these people;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
clm_integrate_minor_natives_title;Integration of the Apache and the Amazonians;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
clm_integrate_minor_natives_desc;The natives of the Apache and the Amazon are few in number but by approaching them with increased autonomy and guaranteed rights we can
column2: at the very least
column3: create a country for them which they can get on with their lives in;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: clm_integrate_mesoamericans_desc;The Mesoamericans have not had an independent country since their conquest over 300 years ago. Now by accepting their customs and granting them rights we can integrate them into our nation;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
guiana_purchase_desc;The Italian colony of Guiana is not worth much to them especially with the turmoil in Europe. Let us make them an offer they cannot refuse;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
accepting_guianas_desc;The Guianans need to be integrated into our nation after their sell out by their previous owner;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
inc_save_guarani_desc;The Guarani are being forced from their land by advancing settlers from Beornia and Lotharingia. Let us integrate them and reclaim their rightful land!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
inc_save_amazon_desc;The Amazonian Natives are being forced from their land by advancing settlers from Gran Colombia and Amazonie. Let us integrate them and reclaim their rightful land!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

inc_save_the_natives_desc;We have now secured the rights of every first people in Ameriga but why stop there? Other Natives in Arcadia are crying out for someone to save them and we must take up this cause and be the true nation for the first peoples!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: there are many more independent people who are coming into first contact with imperialistic powers. We should seek to protect them in order to spare them the fate that almost became of us...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: egypt_sudan_desc;While many in our nation see our future in the middle east
column2: the Turks have proven themselves too difficult a target to dislodge. We should refocus our efforts on securing the Nile river as a viable route of expansion.;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: egypt_horn_desc;The Horn of Africa is responsible for part of the Nile's flow as well as being an important shipping route. All we need do is tolerate their god as we have done with the Coptics for many years now and they will make fine new citizens.;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
egypt_lake_victoria_title; The Source of the Nile;;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

egypt_lake_victoria_desc; Explores have finaly been able to contact the tribes inhabiting the lake from which the Nile flows. We cannot afford any other nation having control of Lake Ukerewe so we should bring the neighbouring tribes into our empire.;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

egypt_defy_turks_desc;Although the Arab peninsula is now open for a righteous conquest our nation will never be safe as long as the Ottomans are on our doorstep. We should focus our efforts on pushing them far away from our homeland of Egypt.;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

egypt_exploit_minorties_desc;We were not the only people to labor under the sultan's heavy hand. By liberating the minorities of Eastern Anatolia and granting them autonomy we can push the Turkish frontier back further.;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: we are uniquely positioned to seize control of central Anatolia. While this would bring a large contingency of Turks inside our empire we can use it as an example of our good governance.;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: egypt_turk_2_desc;We have demonstrated our ability to rule over the Turks within our dignity and harmony. Perhaps the issue was not with the Turks themselves but with the house of Osmon. Liberating the Turks from their tyrant will surely allow us to create a nation in which we can all serve as equals.;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
egypt_levant_desc;Since the successful rebellion of the Zahiri
column2: Egypt has become a beacon of light in the Arab World. With Al-Quds under our control and the European Powers acknowledging our power we can safely proclaim ourselves the Protector of the Arabs and expel the Turks from the Mashriq ! ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: aimaran_congress_desc;Let us hold a congress to decide the fate of the Aimaran people within our country. By giving them rights and integrating their culture we can hope for their integration into our country;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
invade_inca_LOT_desc;The Incas are a thorn in any Amerigan nation's side due to their desire to liberate Ameriga from what they call evil European oppressors. Lets solve this issue;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

integrate_amazonian_natives_lot_desc;The Natives of Ameriga deserve some autonomy especially since they seem more susceptible to disease. Lets leave them be and maybe even give them some representation in our country;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
integrate_guranani_lot_desc;The Guranai people have on occasions come into conflict with our settlers. Lets now however compromise with them and establish a regional parliment for them;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

become_true_lotharingia_desc;Our country's name dates back to the beginnings of the Holy Roman Empire as a successor state of Charlemagne's Empire. However now with our foothold once again in Europe we can restore this State to it's former Glory;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

return_to_france_ama_desc;France and England united long ago under the Plantagenet dynasty. However this union has not at all been stable and now with our return to Europe we can restore that forgotten French Kingdom once more!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
fall_of_burgundy_net_desc;With the fall of our former heartlands and enemies on all sides
column2: it has been decided that we shall abdicate the title of kingdom of Burgundy and instead be known as king of Holland Instead;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: dm_integrate_catalonia_desc;The Catalan People have many things in common with the Provencal people. We should use this as context for a conquest of the region;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

form_north_sea_empire_eng_desc;The North Sea Empire was a Viking union between England and Denmark over 900 years ago. We can now re-embrace this history and establish a new Empire with more modern aims;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: despite not being a part of France for centuries
column3: still has many linguistic and cultural connections with the French. We should integrate them into a greater French State;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: integrate_catalans_fra_desc;The Catalan People have many things in common with the Provencal people. We should use this as context for a conquest of the region;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
integrate_basque_fra_desc;The Basque people have lived under our guardianship for ages. We should proceed with integrating them further into our nation;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
integrate_bretons_fra_desc;The Breton People have adopted the French traditions and Customs long ago. Integration of them into a French nation shall be easy;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
ibr_integrate_occitania_desc;The Occitan People and Catalan People share many common linguistic and cultural traditions. We should integrate them into our union;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

ibr_push_into_occitania_desc;The Pyrenees are a good natural border against any northern incursions into our land but we would be even more secure if we can secure land beyond these peaks...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: our position on the Iberian Peninsular has been left untenable. We must shift our focus to Italy or otherwise fall into Irrelevancy...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
our position on the Italian Peninsular has been left untenable. We must shift our focus to Iberia or otherwise fall into Irrelevancy...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: push_to_the_alps_desc;Now with Central and Southern Italy Secured
column2: we must finish the unification process off and unite our people from Bari to the Alps!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
our position in Italy is no longer tenable. We must retreat to Greece in order to remain relevant in this volatile world...;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: dutch_advance_along_rhine_desc;The Rijn is a crucial waterway and a massive source of income commercially for our ports. Control of the upper river would extend our monopoly and stranglehold on trade within the German Heartlands;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

dutch_push_to_the_wesser_desc;The Wesser River is another key river for trade within the German Confederation. Countrol of it's Western bank will surely increase our stranglehold on trade entering and exiting Germany
tur_restore_persia_desc;Persia has been claimed by us for hundreds of years
column2: our courts still use the Persian language for legal things and we historically ruled over it as the Seljuks. Lets now restore this history and become the Emperor of Persia once more!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X
